experiences.title: Northern Lights in Lapland
experiences.teaser: Experience the magical aurora borealis in Sweden's wilderness with dog sledding and ice hotels.

experiences.title: Stockholm Archipelago Tour
experiences.teaser: Explore Sweden's stunning archipelago with 30,000 islands, skerries, and traditional summer houses.

experiences.title: West Coast Seafood Adventure
experiences.teaser: Discover Sweden's west coast with fresh seafood, fishing villages, and beautiful coastal landscapes.

experiences.title: Midnight Sun Experience
experiences.teaser: Experience 24-hour daylight in Sweden's northernmost city with hiking and Sami culture.

articles.title: Best Time to See Northern Lights
articles.body: The optimal period is September to March, with clear, dark skies away from city lights. Swedish Lapland offers some of the world's best viewing conditions.

articles.title: Swedish Archipelago Guide
articles.body: Take ferry boats between islands, stay in traditional red cottages, and enjoy fresh seafood. Summer months offer the warmest weather and longest days.

articles.title: Planning Your Swedish Adventure
articles.body: Book accommodations early, especially for northern lights season. Consider the midnight sun period for unique hiking experiences in endless daylight.
